title: Venezuela opposition leader visits White House: Here's how it went.
shortDescription: Maria Corina Machado, the leader of Venezuela's opposition, has said she should lead the country. The White House doesn't seem to agree.

title: Machado ‘presented’ Nobel Prize medal to Trump
shortDescription: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado said she presented President Donald Trump her Nobel Peace Prize medal during their meeting.

title: Venezuela opposition leader presents Trump with her Nobel Peace Prize
shortDescription: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado said she presented President Donald Trump her Nobel Peace Prize medal during their Jan. 15 meeting.

title: Trump releases long-awaited health care plan. What's in it?
shortDescription: Trump called on Congress to pass a series of measures aimed at lowering drug prices and health insurance costs in his long-awaited health care plan.

title: Trump touts new healthcare plan
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced the "Great Healthcare Plan," promising lower costs and transparency while rejecting ACA enhanced benefits.

title: Will the Dems win the House in 2026? Analysis shows a strong chance.
shortDescription: The Cook Political Report shifted 18 races in Democrats' direction.

title: White House press secretary spars with columnist over ICE shooting
shortDescription: Karoline Leavitt spared with Niall Stanage, White House columnist for The Hill, over ICE, calling him "biased."

title: ICE official resigns to run for Congress in Ohio
shortDescription: Madison Sheahan, 28, is a graduate of Ohio State University. She is seeking to oust longtime incumbent Democratic Rep. Marcy Kaptur.

title: GOP congressman splits with Trump over Greenland, calls it 'buffoonery'
shortDescription: In an interview, GOP Rep. Don Bacon slammed the president's efforts to take over Greenland, warning it could lead to his impeachment.

title: Congressional factions want to challenge Trump immigration policies
shortDescription: The fatal shooting by an ICE agent in Minneapolis last week has some calling for Congress to defund ICE.

title: The strange case of Trump's missing Greenland envoy
shortDescription: Louisiana Gov. Jeff Landry has played a low-key-to-vanishing role over Greenland since his appointment as Trump's special envoy to the Arctic island.

title: Why does Trump want Greenland? Polls show a US takeover is unpopular
shortDescription: What does Greenland have that Donald Trump wants? He said US needs control of the island for national security. What Denmark and Greenland leaders say

title: Trump threatens Insurrection Act as Minnesota shootings spark unrest
shortDescription: Trump accused demonstrators of "attacking" ICE agents and said if Minnesota authorities don't respond, he "will institute the INSURRECTION ACT."

title: GOP kills bill on military action in Venezuela
shortDescription: Several lawmakers who initially supported the measure switched their votes after pressure from President Donald Trump.

title: US seizes Venezuela-tied tanker before Trump-Machado meetup, officials
shortDescription: Another Venezuela-linked tanker has been seized, U.S. officials said, prior to meeting between Trump and opposition leader Maria Corina Machado.

title: Trump threatens Insurrection Act amid growing unrest in Minneapolis
shortDescription: Wednesday's shooting followed days of chaotic clashes in Minneapolis since the fatal shooting of Renee Good by an ICE agent a week ago.

title: Hundreds of thousands of dollars raised for Ford worker who heckled Trump
shortDescription: The incident that led to the worker being suspended happened Jan. 13 during a visit by Trump to Ford's Dearborn Truck Plant.
